meanings.definition: A genus of free-living ciliated protozoans.
meanings.sent1: The tetrahymena swims gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study tetrahymena to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The tetrahymena threw a tiny party in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the tetrahymena looked like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the tiny tetrahymena moving around.

meanings.definition: Any member of the genus Tetrahymena.
meanings.sent1: I observed a tetrahymena under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The tetrahymena population in the lake is thriving.
meanings.sent3: The tetrahymena choir sang beautifully in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, the tetrahymena is a star.
meanings.sent5: The tetrahymena community works together to survive.
